modName: Robb Stark Follower from HBO Game of Thrones
summary: My new follower inspired by GoT HBO series
descriptionHtml:
[b][center][size=5][color=#efefef][color=#45818e]ROBB STARK Game of Thrones FOLLOWER[/color]

[/color][size=3][color=#efefef]Robb is now a STANDALONE FOLLOWER which means no other mods will be required.
　You can use this mod with no problem whatever body types you're using.
[color=#980000]HIGLY RACCOMANDED: WIC CLOAKS by Nivea here: http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13486/?[/color]
[color=#ff0000](i have no permission to use in mod..)[/color]
Textures: SkySight Skins - Ultra HD 4K and 2K - Male Textures and
Real Feet Meshes by [b]fadingsignal[/b]
Default Weapon : Steel Sword.
Location : Drunken Huntsman in Whiterun
Combat Style : Warrior 1H
[/color][size=2][size=3][color=#efefef]..and is unkillable[/color]
[size=5][b][size=3][size=4]AS ALWAYS..REPORT ME ANY ISSUE..THANK YOU!
HIGHLY RACCOMANDED - Face Light by [b]tktk[/b] here: http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13457/?
[size=3][Credit]
[size=2][size=3]
・RaceMenu by [b]Expired[/b][/size] here: http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29624/?[/size][/size][/size][/size][/b][/size]
